name: Piano Tap Ways to Be Wicked
name_original: Piano Tap Ways to Be Wicked
description:
Let's play Piano Descendants 2 specials song "Ways to Be Wicked". Tap the purple tiles, don't tap tiles other the purple tiles. Don't give up, keep trying until victorious.
Tap game with following the rhythm of his music.

There are four types in this piano:
1. Arcade, follow the music of the song.
2. Survival, do not any tiles missing.
3. Time Trial, a game with given time for 30 second.
4. Bomb, don't tap the red tiles, it is bomb.

Do not forget rating for this game, and thank you for support.


DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application.
It is not affiliated or endorsed by Descendants 2 or record label.
For entertainment purposes only.
